name: Painless Productions
overview:
Based in Los Angeles, Painless Productions is one of the television industryâ€™s most innovative and respected full-service production companies.

Founded in 1995, Painless produces and develops television programming for many of the largest entertainment companies in the world, including Discovery, Animal Planet, TLC, Travel Channel, VH-1, MTV, Spike, ABC Family, Disney Channel, E!, GSN, TruTV, FOX, FX, Fox Movie Channel and Tribune Entertainment. Their productions range from documentary to reality scripted live- action and animation.

We believe that good television usually results from simplifying the creative process, by developing straightforward solutions to complex situations… thus the name “Painless.”
